Description: Universal profile for DirectInput wheels - Conservative settings optimized for compatibility

TuningNotes.Overview: Conservative settings designed to work well across different wheel manufacturers
TuningNotes.SelfCentering: Set to 0.50 - Middle ground that won't overwhelm weaker motors
TuningNotes.RoadFeel: Set to 0.55 - Moderate detail to avoid harsh feedback on budget wheels
TuningNotes.OversteerStrength: Set to 0.60 - Provides drift assistance without requiring precise motor control
TuningNotes.DamperStrength: Set to 0.22 - Higher damping helps smooth out less refined FFB systems
TuningNotes.MinForceThreshold: Set to 0.025 - Higher threshold to avoid buzz on wheels with less motor resolution
TuningNotes.Recommendation: If your wheel supports it, try loading a manufacturer-specific profile for better results
